title: New: AQUILO – You There
body:
Well this is just a little bit beautiful.

A year on from the release of their debut track, [Calling Me](https://soundcloud.com/aquilouk/calling-me), British duo **AQUILO** (Ben and Tom) return with the simply wondrous _You There_. Tender and elegantly composed, it’s easy to see how the tranquil nature of the environment in which they recorded (the Lake District) has rubbed off on the track. This is **Bon Iver** levels of artistry.
